section:
Passing the latticed windows of a tavern, you happen to glance inside where you see a tall young woman having dinner with an older man who has a scholarly look about him. You walk on a few steps and then stop as if struck by a thunderbolt. The woman is Lauria, the thief who twice played you for a fool. You swore you’d get even with her one day!
Go inside and confront her Wait for her to leave Swallow your pride and forget it
